ygData.subject: Re: Quest Items?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard someone say the mallet pieces are for a necromancer quest, haven t been able to verify this though. Belgarth Windstalker ...
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard someone say the mallet pieces are for a
necromancer quest, haven't been able to verify this
though.

Belgarth Windstalker

--- Lemac Justerian <lemac@...> wrote:
> From: "Lemac Justerian" <lemac@...>
>
> I recently looted some mobs and have recieved the
> following items which I
> +ACo-think+ACo- maybe for quests, but I don't have
> info on who or what they are for:
>
> Mallet Head
> Mallet Handle
> Metal Disk
>
> I got the first two in Befallen, the other somewhere
> in North Ro I think...
> Can't remember...
>
> Please let me know if you know of anything they are
> for? I cannot use them
> (as far as I know) and the first two items I cannot
> even sell...
>
> Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric on Karana server
>
>
